metadata.title: CVE-2019-11010 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20190322 Q8, there is a memory leak in the function ReadMPCImage of coders/mpc.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted image file.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4~hg15968-1').
